function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Climate change leading to increased deaths in developing countries","Impact":"250,000 additional lives per year","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to reduce greenhouse gas emissions, adapting infrastructure to withstand climate change impacts","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, climate-resilient infrastructure","People":"Populations in developing countries","Owner":"Governments, international organizations"},{"Description":"Long-term acceptance of lockdown measures due to temporary nature","Impact":"Less acceptance if measures were permanent","Mitigation":"Communicating the temporary nature of measures, providing support during lockdowns, and planning for a return to normalcy","Technologies":"Communication technologies, support systems for vulnerable populations","People":"General population","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, community leaders"},{"Description":"Perception of climate change as a crisis with temporary solutions","Impact":"Delay in implementing permanent transformations to address climate change","Mitigation":"Changing the narrative around climate change, promoting long-term sustainability solutions, and integrating climate action into policy and planning","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, sustainable infrastructure, carbon capture and storage","People":"Global population","Owner":"Governments, international organizations, private sector"}]}
